sql.query:
SELECT user_mobile, scheme_id, balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, 
m_commission.operator_id, m_op.service_id, ma.id as api_id 
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = m_commission.operator_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = m_op.service_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_api AS ma ON (ma.api_code = @api_code)
where m_op.operator_name = @op_name AND m_commission.scheme_id = @scheme AND m_service.service_name = @service_name;

values.value: {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Amount+' by '+GetUser.user_mobile+'  and Benef. Id '+$_POST.BenefId+' for Money Transfer Verification | Net Amt. '+RTPayableAmt}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, opening_balance, amount, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, ip_address, process_mode, live, tr_date, transaction_by, dtcommper, dtcommval, dtcommamt, dtchargeper, dtchargeval, dtchargeamt, mdtcommper, mdtcommval, mdtcommamt, mdtchargeper, mdtchargeval, mdtchargeamt, remitter_id, bank_ac_no) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetComm[0].operator_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetComm[0].service_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetComm[0].api_id}} */, :P4 /* {{identity}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBankAc}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.BenefId}} */, :P7 /* {{GetUser.balance_amt}} */, :P8 /* {{Amount}} */, :P9 /* {{GetComm[0].comm_per}} */, :P10 /* {{GetComm[0].comm_val}} */, :P11 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{GetComm[0].service_charge_val}} */, :P13 /* {{GetComm[0].service_charge_per}} */, :P14 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P15 /* {{RTPayableAmt}} */, :P16 /* {{RTClosingBalance.toNumber()}} */, :P17 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P18 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P19 /* {{'PENDING'}} */, :P20 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P21 /* {{'Transfer of Rs. '+Amount+' by '+GetUser.user_mobile+'  and Benef. Id '+$_POST.BenefId+' for Money Transfer Verification | Net Amt. '+RTPayableAmt}} */, :P22 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P23 /* {{'A2P'}} */, :P24 /* {{'Live'}} */, :P25 /* {{NOW}} */, :P26 /* {{identity}} */, :P27 /* {{0}} */, :P28 /* {{0}} */, :P29 /* {{0}} */, :P30 /* {{0}} */, :P31 /* {{0}} */, :P32 /* {{0}} */, :P33 /* {{0}} */, :P34 /* {{0}} */, :P35 /* {{0}} */, :P36 /* {{0}} */, :P37 /* {{0}} */, :P38 /* {{0}} */, :P39 /* {{GetUser.user_mobile}} */, :P40 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBankAc}} */)

params.name: :P21

(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetUser.balance_amt.toNumber()}} */, :P3 /* {{Amount}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBalance.toNumber()}} */, :P5 /* {{'Money Transfer Verify'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */, :P10 /* {{'Number: '+GetUser.user_mobile+' | Amount: Rs. '+Amount+' | Verify Money Transfer | Ref. Id: '+RechTrans.identity+' | Comm Per: '+GetComm[0].comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetComm[0].comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_per+' | Charge Val: '+GetComm[0].service_charge_val+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt.: '+RTPayableAmt+' | Beneficiary Id:  '+$_POST.BenefId+' | Remitter Mobile:  '+GetUser.user_mobile}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{RTPayableAmt}} */, :P14 /* {{'PENDING'}} */)

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE aeps_beneficiary_cashfree
SET state = :P1 /* {{1}} */, city = :P2 /* {{BankCity}} */, benef_name = :P3 /* {{AccountHolderName}} */, address1 = :P4 /* {{BranchName}} */
WHERE parent_id = :P5 /* {{identity}} */ AND benef_id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.BenefId}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, api_logs = :P2 /* {{'CFDMT'}} */, is_processed = :P3 /* {{UTR}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{Message}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{RefId}} */, revert_trans = '0', api_response_id = :P6 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, updated_on = :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, bank_ac_no = :P8 /* {{$_POST.VerifyBankAc}} */
WHERE id = :P9 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{DrBalanceRT.identity}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{balance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET closing_balance = :P1 /* {{balance}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, api_logs = :P3 /* {{'CFDMT'}} */, api_response_id = :P4 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{RefId}} */, operator_ref = :P6 /* {{Message}} */, revert_trans = '1', updated_on = :P7 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE id = :P8 /* {{RechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{'FAILED'}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{DrBalanceRT.identity}} */
